attrIn.name: in
attrIn.comment: This input provides the data. It is usually connected to a UsdPrimvarReader_float2 that will provide the data.

attrRotation.name: rotation
attrRotation.label: rotation
attrRotation.comment: Counter-clockwise rotation in degrees around the origin to be applied to all components of the data.

attrScale.name: scale
attrScale.comment: Scale around the origin to be applied to all components of the data.

attrTranslation.name: translation
attrTranslation.comment: Translation to be applied to all components of the data.
